<p><a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/deals/amazon-prime-day-2025-the-best-early-deals-to-shop-now-dates-and-everything-else-you-need-to-know-120028780.html">Prime Day 2025</a> begins soon on July 8, but members can already save on a bunch of tech available on Amazon's site. One such early deal is on the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0CVJ3K8FF&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=558b5187-94f7-4948-95fa-abe75751ae47&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Roomba+Robot+Vacuum+and+Mop+Combo&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwQ1ZKM0s4RkY_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiNTU4YjUxODctOTRmNy00OTQ4LTk1ZmEtYWJlNzU3NTFhZTQ3Iiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwQ1ZKM0s4RkYiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&amp;signature=AQAAAWNVH-0Qb1wCB8sOPQTPQcAZoFZlBrn3kaESG0GSmFkF&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0CVJ3K8FF" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CVJ3K8FF?th=1">Roomba Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo</a>, which is down to $140 for Prime members right now. That's nearly half off its usual price and a far cry from its standard $275 cost.</p> 
<p>We ranked iRobot's Roomba Robot Vacuum as our <a data-i13n="cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/home/smart-home/best-budget-robot-vacuums-133030847.html">overall favorite budget option</a>, but this Prime Day deal features a version that can both vacuum and mop. With the Prime Day price drop, the vacuum and mop combo is cheaper than the vacuum-only model, but it does double the work. The combo Roomba can even be set to only vacuum if you prefer to mop yourself, but you'd be missing out on the four-stage cleaning system that vacuums and mops in the same pass.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p>
 <core-commerce id="d4baedf168a547a7bd8ac3b2b4954aec" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CVJ3K8FF?th=1"></core-commerce></p> 
<p></p> 
<p>Since it's a Roomba, it's a straightforward setup process that takes a few minutes before you can set it and forget it. The robot vacuum can navigate through your house or apartment, avoiding furniture and stairs, thanks to onboard sensors. Once it drains through its battery, which can last up to 120 hours, the Roomba knows to return to its charging dock to recharge itself. You can even customize this combo Roomba with three levels of both suction power for vacuuming and water levels for mopping. For more control, you can program it to spot clean a single spot in your home or schedule cleaning times through the companion iRobot Home app.</p> 
<p>A number of other <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=558b5187-94f7-4948-95fa-abe75751ae47&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=iRobot+machines&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAagm1tRVtk8Afv6jlifKt2GXkTGE7vdHYj48hcb4fYTs&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fstores%2Fpage%2F7FE9A12A-454F-4760-AB69-F2E70C5447C8" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/stores/page/7FE9A12A-454F-4760-AB69-F2E70C5447C8?ingress=2&amp;lp_context_asin=B0CVJ3K8FF&amp;visitId=b7fd4c81-8cde-4b9a-92c9-2adc765fbd25&amp;store_ref=bl_ast_dp_brandLogo_sto&amp;ref_=ast_bln">iRobot machines</a> are on sale for Prime Day as well. That includes the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DPNKS3KQ&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=558b5187-94f7-4948-95fa-abe75751ae47&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Roomba+104&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAd4vqL5QTfx9HlnN2iG9b3pUMREg4YV29qFqV1BNmXwk&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FiRobot-Roomba-Combo-Vacuum-AutoEmpty%2Fdp%2FB0DPNKS3KQ" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/iRobot-Roomba-Combo-Vacuum-AutoEmpty/dp/B0DPNKS3KQ?ref_=pb_hm_dp">Roomba 104</a> with auto-empty dock for 44 percent off, down to $250, and the premium <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0C415NHBM&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=558b5187-94f7-4948-95fa-abe75751ae47&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Roomba+j9%2B&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAbaRAp4_DKTH0TinFFcbJ074rFcE527ST_tILKj-1HIE&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FiRobot-Roomba-Self-Emptying-Robot-Vacuum%2Fdp%2FB0C415NHBM" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/iRobot-Roomba-Self-Emptying-Robot-Vacuum/dp/B0C415NHBM?ref_=pb_hm_dp&amp;th=1&amp;psc=1">Roomba j9+</a> for 36 percent off, down to $579.</p>This article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com/deals/prime-day-deal-pick-up-this-roomba-combo-robot-vacuum-and-mop-while-its-nearly-50-percent-off-141013222.html?src=rss
